attributes.action: Admit that alien technology is responsilbe for the un-usually speedy advance of our society in the last 50 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Has technology moved unusually quickly since the Roswell incident. We have developed laser weapons,fibre optics the silicone chip and hundreds of other gadgets to many to mention but our advancement is moving faster than we can keep up with.
Is it possible we may find ourselves in a world of artifical intelligence and syber people thus heralding the end of the human race as we know it..

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions we cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognize" or "acknowledge" something, as they do not clearly call for a recognizable action. See terms and conditions here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
